name: Junior Number One
desc: When set this card in [Value Area], you can take a card with [Natural] Category from desk to your hand.
author: robzhou

name: Addition
desc: When this card is successfully setted in the [Operator Zone], select two cards in the [Value Zone] on the field and switch their order.
author: robzhou

name: It is an even number!
desc: When this card is placed in the Assertion Zone, you can discard one card in the [Even] category and then draw one card from the deck.
author: robzhou

name: Number Zero
desc: Once per turn. When setting a value or entering the discard pile, you can retrieve one [Assertion Card] from the deck and add it to your hand.
author: robzhou
